title: don't waste your money
review: I don't get it.  I've heard the hype, I've seen the box office numbers, I've read the reviews...so what is all the fuss about?  Was this supposed to be a horror movie?  I wasn't scared at any point during this movie.  It didn't really seem like the actors were either - even the female character's screams seem manufactured and sometimes over the top.The only thing this movie excelled at was giving me motion sickness and a migraine headache.  Save your money and go rent a real horror movie like Halloween, Scream or The Shining.
